strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Good morning, and welcome back to Friday! Here are some things to do this weekend:

  • Shop and hang: You're sure to find something wonderful at The Market at Record on Saturday from 9a-noon.
  • Fun run: The Jingle Bell jog at the Botanical Gardens in Fayetteville is tomorrow.
  • Singin': Go out to your favorite place and hear some local talent play live music.
  • Comedy: You could possibly hear the best joke ever tonight at Bike Rack.
  • Play: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever is showing all weekend.
  • Ballet: Today and Tomorrow the sugar plum fairy, the snow queen, and the nutcracker prince are back.
  • Celebrate: The Core Brewery Taproom is hosting a Christmas party tonight, and you're invited.

Have fun! Happy Holidays, and bye for now!
